code: public static JobExecutionResult tryExecute(StreamExecutionEnvironment see, String name) throws Exception {     try {         return see.execute(name).     } catch (ProgramInvocationException | JobExecutionException root) {         Throwable cause = root.getCause().         // search for nested SuccessExceptions         int depth = 0.         while (!(cause instanceof SuccessException)) {             if (cause == null || depth++ == 20) {                 root.printStackTrace().                 fail("Test failed: " + root.getMessage()).             } else {                 cause = cause.getCause().             }         }     }     return null. }
